name: Nogi-v-Ruki [VR]
description:
Embody the “Nope” in virtual reality:

  • Fly and crawl around
  • Fight lasers
  • Look weird

Controls for HTC Vive:

  • Press trackpads to switch from feet to wings
  • Use grip buttons to activate the third person monitor (Looking glass)
  • Squeeze triggers to stretch feet into spikes

Disclaimer:

This is the first public demo of what is basically my very first game. Things can and will go wrong here.  I’ve built and tested the game on a single PC, so all I know for sure is that it runs with the original Vive. Other Vives and Rifts might work too, but I’m hoping some of you can tell me that from experience.

I really need any feedback I can get!

Join "Nogi-v-Ruki" Discord server if you’re that kind of person.
